Text.Page: Heads. That's what I need. Specifically, the heads of the argonomorph ossugon warlords around Raga Kabash. I can't figure out how the argons reprogrammed them!
With these samples, I think I can reverse engineer the argon's indoctrination techniques for machinery. Well, it's on to the next chamber for you.
I know, I know, argons nearby, got to evacuate...what? You're not trying to make me leave? Good. Because I was going to refuse.
